column4: do i have to reboot to find a windows partition i just mounted ?
no
where di dyou mount it?
/media/windows
so, type ls /media/windows and thats where it is
or open the file manager at /media/windows
so, what do you need to know now?
ok, what problem exactly?
start sshd, give me a username and password and i will fix it for you
ok, change vfat to auto and user to users and make sure there are a couple of new lines at the bottom of the file (press enter a couple of times before you save it)
then to mount it you can just type mount /media/windows
what?
ok
i take it it worked?
good, does it work?
it never is :)
Now to get totem codecs , does synaptics p manager have the codecs
you need universe and multiverse repos
its very easy
yeah, iptables takes a bit of getting used to, if this is not a headless server you might want to try gaurddog
its a non easy gui interface to iptables but it is easyer that the command line (unless your familiar with the iptables commands that is :))
